item.title: Thank God there is iodine! IPv4 over DNS
item.description: I always knew DNS/ICMP traffic is mostly allowed and un-monitored. It was about time to setup some DNS server on my vServer which would allow me to break free! Thanks God there is iodine which allows you to route IP traffic over DNS. I was recently at some cafe and thought it would be a great ideea to test my configuration. I’ve setup the iodine server a few weeks before.This is what I did:
